turn.speaker: steven_pasternak
turn.label: Mr. Steven Pasternak

turn.text: In here...

turn.speaker: steven_pasternak

turn.speaker: stephen_g_breyer

turn.speaker: steven_pasternak
turn.label: Mr. Steven Pasternak
turn.text: If we're looking for parallelism between the two, then it would make sense to have the Monell standard, but it not necessarily has to follow because under common law, we would have the respondeat superior.

turn.label: Unknown Speaker

turn.label: Unknown Speaker

turn.speaker: unknown_speaker
turn.label: Unknown Speaker

turn.label: Unknown Speaker

turn.speaker: steven_pasternak
turn.label: Mr. Steven Pasternak
